2+1.sig_info: By conjuring a magical barrier, Mordo gains 1066.67 to 6398.37 Energy Resistance while he remains Blocking.

PASSIVE: Mordo's astral form grants him immunity to passive Ability Accuracy reduction effects.
Every 8 seconds, Mordo gets one bar of Power over 5 seconds. While the Power Gain is active, opponents can interrupt it by landing a hit on Mordo.
WHEN STUNNED: While Stunned, Mordo Evades an incoming non-Special Attack, quickly counter-attacking to inflict Degeneration for 66.4 Direct Damage over 2.50 seconds. This ability does not activate if Mordo is suffering from a Concussion or Fatigue Debuff.
BLOCKING: After holding Block for 0.50 seconds, Mordo can Block Unblockable Special Attacks.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Mordo gains 16.6% of max Power per second while below 1 Power bar.
Exponentially gains up to 10 Fury stacks while charging a Heavy Attack, each charge increases his Attack by 12.45.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 30% chance to Stun for 3 second(s).
Causes Degeneration, inflicting 66.4 Direct Damage over 2.50 seconds. If the opponent has a Buff, Degeneration will activate even after a successful Block.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Opponents suffer from Mordo’s Soul Barb spell for 14 seconds, dealing 9.96 Energy Damage per opponent Buff per second. Additionally, Soul Barb reduces Health recovery by 70%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gains 3 stacks of Fury, each increasing his Attack by 41.5 for 12 seconds.
Up to 40% chance based on Health lost to Regenerate instead of gaining a Fury stack, Recovering 168.15 Health in 6 seconds.

PASSIVE: Mordo's astral form grants him immunity to passive Ability Accuracy reduction effects.
Every 8 seconds, Mordo gets one bar of Power over 5 seconds. While the Power Gain is active, opponents can interrupt it by landing a hit on Mordo.
WHEN STUNNED: While Stunned, Mordo Evades an incoming non-Special Attack, quickly counter-attacking to inflict Degeneration for 2714.4 Direct Damage over 2.50 seconds. This ability does not activate if Mordo is suffering from a Concussion or Fatigue Debuff.
BLOCKING: After holding Block for 0.50 seconds, Mordo can Block Unblockable Special Attacks.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Mordo gains 16.6% of max Power per second while below 1 Power bar.
Exponentially gains up to 10 Fury stacks while charging a Heavy Attack, each charge increases his Attack by 508.95.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 30% chance to Stun for 3 second(s).
Causes Degeneration, inflicting 2714.4 Direct Damage over 2.50 seconds. If the opponent has a Buff, Degeneration will activate even after a successful Block.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Opponents suffer from Mordo’s Soul Barb spell for 14 seconds, dealing 407.16 Energy Damage per opponent Buff per second. Additionally, Soul Barb reduces Health recovery by 70%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gains 3 stacks of Fury, each increasing his Attack by 1696.5 for 12 seconds.
Up to 40% chance based on Health lost to Regenerate instead of gaining a Fury stack, Recovering 6944.7 Health in 6 seconds.
